title: Simulation-Based Procedural Skill Acquisition: Applications in Social Sciences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of social science theories and foundational data analysis skills
context.additional_context: Social scenario analysis training via simulation in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Emphasis on collaboration and feedback exchange among learners

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform over 80% of social survey procedures using simulation tools.
Learners can develop three or more procedurally designed experimental scenarios for a given social issue.
The ability to write data-driven policy proposals based on simulation results is assessed.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
